describe: Pakistan is a country in South Asia, known for its rich history, diverse cultures, and stunning landscapes ranging from mountains to deserts.

cities.name: 🏝 Karachi
cities.geographical_location: Located in the southern part of Pakistan along the Arabian Sea coast.
cities.climate: Karachi has a hot desert climate with mild winters and hot summers.

cities.name: 🏰 Lahore
cities.geographical_location: Situated in the northeastern part of Pakistan near the Ravi River.
cities.climate: Lahore experiences a semi-arid climate with hot summers and cool winters.

cities.name: 🏔 Islamabad
cities.geographical_location: Located in the northern part of Pakistan at the foothills of the Himalayas.
cities.climate: Islamabad has a humid subtropical climate with hot summers and mild winters.
cities.famous_cuisine: Chapli Kebab, Daal Chawal, and Pulao

cities.name: 🏰 Peshawar
cities.geographical_location: Situated in the northwestern region of Pakistan near the Khyber Pass.
cities.climate: Peshawar has a semi-arid climate with hot summers and mild winters.
cities.famous_cuisine: Charsi Tikka, Kabuli Pulao, and Peshawari Naan

cities.name: 🏔 Quetta
cities.geographical_location: Located in the western part of Pakistan, surrounded by mountains.
cities.climate: Quetta has a semi-arid climate with cold winters and warm summers.
